rotate_wheel_to_move_chair.description: Rotate the wheel to move the chair to a different position.

clean_wheel_to_improve_movement.description: Clean the wheel to improve the chair's movement and prevent any damage.

general_clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the chair.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to move the chair.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_lever_to_adjust_height.description: Rotate the lever to adjust the chair's height according to user preference.

clean_lever_to_improve_functioning.description: Clean the lever to ensure smooth functioning and prevent any damage.

press_lever.description: Press the lever to adjust the chair's height.

general_clean_lever.description: Clean the lever of the chair.

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever on the chair.

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_knob_to_change_position.description: Rotate the knob to change the chair's position according to user preference.

clean_knob_for_better_grip.description: Clean the knob to ensure a better grip and smooth functioning.

general_clean_knob.description: Clean the knob of the chair.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the chair.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_caster_for_orientation.description: Rotate the caster to change the chair's orientation according to user preference.

clean_caster_to_reduce_friction.description: Clean the caster to reduce friction and increase the chair's lifespan.

general_clean_caster.description: Clean the caster of the chair.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster to adjust the chair.

clean_caster.description: Clean the caster to ensure smooth operation.

press_seat_to_check_comfort.description: Press the seat to check for comfort and any deformities in cushioning.

clean_seat_to_maintain_hygiene.description: Clean the seat to maintain hygiene and increase overall lifespan of the chair.

general_clean_seat.description: Clean the seat of the chair.

general_press_seat.description: Press the seat of the chair to test its comfort.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat to ensure a comfortable sitting experience.

clean_leg_to_maintain_appearance.description: Clean the leg of the chair to maintain its appearance and prevent damage.

general_clean_leg.description: Clean the legs of the chair.

clean_chair_to_increase_longevity.description: Clean the entire chair including wheel, lever, knob, caster, seat, and leg to increase its longevity and usability.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the lever, knob, caster, wheel, seat, and legs.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to maintain the chair's aesthetic.
